participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: He is somewhat introverted and often feels sad about his life circumstances. He tries to find comfort in small pleasures like video games, but struggles with deeper issues.
participant_1.background: I am overweight and unhappy. I work at a nursing home. My wife left me and took my children. I do not believe in god. I spend most of my time on facebook when I am not working.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: He is optimistic and a bit quirky, embracing his unique experiences with a sense of humor. He has a curious mind and enjoys learning about different things.
participant_2.background: Since the surgery I have had strange powers. I can move objects with my mind. I had to have a transplant. I am a boy. I was born with my heart outside my body.

content.text: Hi, I'm (user 1's name).
Hi, I'm (user 2's name).
What do you do for work?
I'm a nurse.
Wow, that's cool! I work at a nursing home.
That's interesting! I've always thought about working in a nursing home.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine. I'm glad you like it.
Thanks. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to play video games and read.
That's cool. I like to play video games too.
What's your favorite video game?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I've played it a few times myself.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. What's your favorite book?
I like a lot of different books, but my favorite is probably The Lord of the Rings.
That's a good choice. I've read it a few times myself.
Yeah, it's a great book.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to watch movies and go to the gym.
That's cool. I like to watch movies too. What's your favorite movie?
I like a lot of different movies, but my favorite is probably The Shawshank Redemption.
That's a good choice. I've seen that movie a few times myself.
Yeah, it's a great movie.
So, what are you up to later?
I'm not sure yet. What are you up to?
I'm not sure either. Maybe we could hang out?
That would be fun! I'll text you later and we can figure out what to do.
Sounds good.
